message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is about person re-identification using deep learning with a metric learning loss. The task involves identifying individuals across different cameras and locations. This falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The proposed method involves hard sample mining, which is a technique used in multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) research. Additionally, the paper discusses the performance of the proposed method in terms of accuracy, which is a common evaluation metric in cryptography (cs.CR).
